entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 20.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 20. Wind chill minus 40 this morning and minus 27 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 25 with temperature rising to minus 19 by morning.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind becoming south 20 km/h gusting to 40 this evening. Low minus 25 with temperature rising to minus 19 by morning. Wind chill minus 31 this evening and minus 37 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 11. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries late in the morning and in the afternoon. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light late in the afternoon. High minus 11. Wind chill minus 31 in the morning and minus 16 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023
